title: Relationship between Ottoman empire and Europe

content.prompt: Which of the following is an accurate description of relations between European states and the Ottoman Empire in the period 1815 to 1914 ?

choices.label: The Ottomans were expanding at the expense of Russia, England, and France.
Russian, English, and French expansion came at the expense of the Ottomans.
The Ottomans, in alliance with the Russians, English, and French, sought to impede German unification.
The Ottomans supported nationalism in the Balkans to destabilize Europe.
The Ottomans and the French cooperated in colonizing North Africa.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
